thoughts.text: I have found more resources for practicing writing in Spanish. I think I should choose one of these resources to start practicing writing in Spanish.
thoughts.reasoning: I have found more resources for practicing writing in Spanish, so it makes sense to choose one of them and start using it to practice writing in Spanish.
thoughts.plan:
- Choose a resource to use for practicing writing in Spanish
- Start using the resource to practice writing in Spanish
- Practice speaking and writing in Spanish consistently
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am practicing consistently and getting feedback on my language skills.
